contents.text: Thank you for calling Restless Bandit in San Francisco, your partners in talent rediscovery.
For assistance with your current account and campaign performance, press 1.
For questions about billing and invoices, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing team.

navigationGoals: Please send me my latest billing statement and clarify an unexpected charge.
I need to review a recent invoice on my account and see if I qualify for a veteran discount.
Reconcile the line-item charges on my latest invoice for API calls used in our last talent rediscovery campaign
Please help me understand the charges on my recent invoice.
I need a copy of my last invoice for the participant recruitment campaign for my lab.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I’m getting an error on my campaign analytics dashboard and need a quick fix.
I can’t log into my account dashboard and need technical support to troubleshoot access issues.
Diagnose the intermittent OAuth token refresh errors in my API integration pipeline
I’m having trouble with my account and need technical support to fix an issue.
I’m having trouble connecting the campaign analytics API to my lab’s database.

contents.text: For sales, pricing information, or to learn about Talent Rediscovery, press 2.
To schedule a personalized demo of our platform, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our demo team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a concise demo of the Talent Rediscovery platform.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to learn how your platform can help me find job opportunities.
Schedule a technical walkthrough of your talent rediscovery API endpoints and analytics dashboard
I’d like to schedule a simple demo to see how the Talent Rediscovery platform works.
I’d like to schedule a demo focusing on advanced candidate filtering for my research recruitment.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with a sales representative about pricing and contract options.
I want to speak with sales about subscription plans and veteran pricing options.
Discuss enterprise pricing tiers for high-volume API usage and SLA guarantees
I want to speak with someone about pricing and subscription options.
I want to discuss pricing plans for a year-long subscription to support our next study.
